# Bone Shards, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Evocation Spells|Evocation]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level White Necromancer Spells|White necromancer 5]], [[5th Level Witch Spells|Witch 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** 60 ft.

**Area:** Cone-shaped burst

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Reflex half

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 134

Jagged shards of bone burst from your hand, dealing 1d6 hp piercing damage per caster level (maximum 15d6) to all creatures within the burst. Living creatures affected by the bone shards also sustain an additional 1d4 hp [[S3.1A-C - Universal Monster Rules A-C (Bestiary 6 Apx)|bleed]] damage each round. This bleeding can be stopped by a successful DC 15 [[Heal (Skill)|Heal]] skill check or through the application of any magical healing. The bone shards vanish immediately after hitting or missing their target.
